Conducts the test apart from what the Tester does

Parameters:
wlist2 - the WordList to test
wt - the WordText field (to show the next word)
stats - the stats field to show user statistics
wordTester - the graphical word tester object
tester - the tester to use for this test
testtype - selects whether to test the user on the grammatical word class
